data.name: Zombie Army 4: 7.65mm Polizeipistole Pistol Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Originally manufactured for German police forces, the 7.65mm Polizeipistole is a favourite of super-spies everywhere. This small and stylish number is sure to turn heads – before blowing them completely off their shoulders.
This Weapon Bundle contains;
- The 7.65mm Polizeipistole
- 2 Charms (Werner Dog Tag, Vesper Martini)
- 2 Bespoke Weapon Skins (Desert Occult, Superspy Chrome)
data.about_the_game:
Originally manufactured for German police forces, the 7.65mm Polizeipistole is a favourite of super-spies everywhere. This small and stylish number is sure to turn heads – before blowing them completely off their shoulders.

data.short_description: Originally manufactured for German police forces, the 7.65mm Polizeipistole is a favourite of super-spies everywhere.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 7 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 7 64-bit version 7601 supported only via the Vulkan launcher option.
